message: Working on 3.6.3 on OS X, though.

When using Safari or Chrome (so-called "Webkit" browsers) when mousing over a row in the groups listing page (Your Groups) the rows change from white to grey. This does not occur in Firefox (Firefox 3.6.6 to be precise)
